<p>Manages connection with a secure WebS:
Manages connection with a secure WebSocket path to signal the Millicast server and establishes a WebRTC connection to view a live stream.

Before you can view an active broadcast, you will need:

  • A connection path that you can get from {@link Director} module or from your own implementation based on Get a Connection Path.
<p>Millicast existing Stream Name where: Millicast existing Stream Name where you want to connect.
<p>Callback function executed when a new: Callback function executed when a new token is needed.
<p>Target HTML media element to mount st: Target HTML media element to mount stream.
<p>Connects to an active stream as subsc:
Connects to an active stream as subscriber.

In the example, addStreamToYourVideoTag and getYourSubscriberConnectionPath is your own implementation.
<p>True to modify SDP for supporting dtx: True to modify SDP for supporting dtx in opus. Otherwise False.
<p>True to modify SDP for supporting abs: True to modify SDP for supporting absolute capture time header extension. Otherwise False.
<p>Disable the opportunity to receive vi: Disable the opportunity to receive video stream.
<p>Disable the opportunity to receive au: Disable the opportunity to receive audio stream.
<p>Number of audio tracks to recieve VAD: Number of audio tracks to recieve VAD multiplexed audio for secondary sources.
<p>Id of the main source that will be re: Id of the main source that will be received by the default MediaStream.
<p>Do not receive media from the these s: Do not receive media from the these source ids.
<p>Promise object which resolves when th: Promise object which resolves when the connection was successfully established.
